title: Editors Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Thu Apr 12, 2018 | 8:07am EDT Editors Choice Pictures 
A protester uses a tennis racket to hit a tear gas canister during the evacuation operation by French gendarmes in the zoned ZAD (Deferred Development Zone) at Notre-Dame-des-Landes, near Nantes, France. REUTERS/Stephane Mahe Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 A protester uses a tennis racket to hit a tear gas canister during the evacuation operation by French gendarmes in the zoned ZAD (Deferred Development Zone) at Notre-Dame-des-Landes, near Nantes, France. REUTERS/Stephane Mahe Close 1 / 24 
U.S. President Donald Trump looks as a woman becomes emotional, before signing H.R. 1865 "The Allow States and Victims To Fight Online Sex Trafficking Act" at the White House. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 U.S. President Donald Trump looks as a woman becomes emotional, before signing H.R. 1865 "The Allow States and Victims To Fight Online Sex Trafficking Act" at the White House. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque Close 
Adam Hague of England in action at the Commonwealth Games. REUTERS/Paul Childs Reuters / Thursday, April 12, 2018 Adam Hague of England in action at the Commonwealth Games. REUTERS/Paul Childs Close 3 / 24 
U.S. Navy Fire Controlman 1st Class Nathaniel Miller hugs his wife goodbye before boarding the guided-missile destroyer USS Bulkeley, part of the Harry S. Truman Carrier Strike Group deployment to the Middle East from Naval Station Norfolk, Virginia.... more Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 U.S. Navy Fire Controlman 1st Class Nathaniel Miller hugs his wife goodbye before boarding the guided-missile destroyer USS Bulkeley, part of the Harry S. Truman Carrier Strike Group deployment to the Middle East from Naval Station Norfolk, Virginia. U.S. Navy/Mass Communication Specialist 2nd Class Lindsey E. Skelton/via REUTERS Close 4 / 24 
House Speaker Paul Ryan (R-WI) addresses a news conference where he announced he would not seek re-election in November, on Capitol Hill in Washington. REUTERS/Aaron P. Bernstein Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 House Speaker Paul Ryan (R-WI) addresses a news conference where he announced he would not seek re-election in November, on Capitol Hill in Washington. REUTERS/Aaron P. Bernstein Close 5 / 24 
A man is seen at the site of an airstrike that destroyed the Community College in Saada, Yemen. REUTERS/Naif Rahma Reuters / Thursday, April 12, 2018 A man is seen at the site of an airstrike that destroyed the Community College in Saada, Yemen. REUTERS/Naif Rahma Close 6 / 24 
The Dragonara Casino is seen at dusk in St Julian's, Malta. Picture taken with long exposure. REUTERS/Darrin Zammit Lupi Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 The Dragonara Casino is seen at dusk in St Julian's, Malta. Picture taken with long exposure. REUTERS/Darrin Zammit Lupi Close 7 / 24 
Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg testifies before a House Energy and Commerce Committee hearing regarding the company's use and protection of user data on Capitol Hill in Washington. REUTERS/Leah Millis Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg testifies before a House Energy and Commerce Committee hearing regarding the company's use and protection of user data on Capitol Hill in Washington. REUTERS/Leah Millis Close 8   9 / 24 
A newborn Asian elephant is pictured on the first day of a public appearance at the Planckendael Zoo in Mechelen, Belgium. REUTERS/Yves Herman Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 A newborn Asian elephant is pictured on the first day of a public appearance at the Planckendael Zoo in Mechelen, Belgium. REUTERS/Yves Herman Close 10 / 24 
Elephants   11 / 24 
New Canadian citizen David Alfonso, 8, reacts as maple taffy is prepared for new Canadians following a citizenship ceremony at the Vanier Sugar Shack in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. REUTERS/Chris Wattie Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 New Canadian citizen David Alfonso, 8, reacts as maple taffy is prepared for new Canadians following a citizenship ceremony at the Vanier Sugar Shack in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. REUTERS/Chris Wattie Close 12 / 24 
Minnesota Twins right fielder Max Kepler (26) reacts with teammates after hitting a walk off home run against the Houston Astros during the ninth inning. Kepler had two home runs on the day. Jeffrey Becker-USA TODAY Sports Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 Minnesota Twins right fielder Max Kepler (26) reacts with teammates after hitting a walk off home run against the Houston Astros during the ninth inning. Kepler had two home runs on the day. Jeffrey Becker-USA TODAY Sports Close 
Gemma Frizelle of Wales competes at   at the Commonwealth Games. REUTERS/David Gray Close 14   15 / 24 
A Palestinian boy looks out a bus window, as he waits to travel into Egypt, after the Rafah border crossing was opened for three days for humanitarian cases, in the southern Gaza Strip. REUTERS/Suhaib Salem Reuters / Thursday, April 12, 2018 A Palestinian boy looks out a bus window, as he waits to travel into Egypt, after the Rafah border crossing was opened for three days for humanitarian cases, in the southern Gaza Strip. REUTERS/Suhaib Salem Close 16 / 24 
Undocumented immigrants just released from detention through "catch and release" immigration policy stand at a bus station before being taken to the Catholic Charities relief center in McAllen, Texas. REUTERS/Loren Elliott Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 Undocumented immigrants just released from detention through "catch and release" immigration policy stand at a bus station before being taken to the Catholic Charities relief center in McAllen, Texas. REUTERS/Loren Elliott Close 17 / 24 
Milagros   18 / 24 
A woman reacts at a protest against the rape of an eight-year-old girl, in Kathua, near Jammu and a teenager in Unnao, Uttar Pradesh state, in New Delhi, India. REUTERS/Cathal McNaughton Reuters / Thursday, April 12, 2018 A woman reacts at a protest against the rape of an eight-year-old girl, in Kathua, near Jammu and a teenager in Unnao, Uttar Pradesh state, in New Delhi, India. REUTERS/Cathal McNaughton Close 19 / 24 
Chelan Lasha weeps as she returns to the courtroom after recess to testify against actor and comedian Bill Cosby during the third day of the retrial of his sexual assault case at the Montgomery County Courthouse in Norristown, Pennsylvania.... more Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 Chelan Lasha weeps as she returns to the courtroom after recess to testify against actor and comedian Bill Cosby during the third day of the retrial of his sexual assault case at the Montgomery County Courthouse in Norristown, Pennsylvania. Dominick Reuter/Pool via REUTERS Close 20 / 24 
Members of the Texas National Guard watch the Mexico-U.S. border from an outpost along the Rio Grande in Roma, Texas. REUTERS/Loren Elliott Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 Members of the Texas National Guard watch the Mexico-U.S. border from an outpost along the Rio Grande in Roma, Texas. REUTERS/Loren Elliott Close 21 / 24 
Palestinian relatives of Hamas gunman Mohammed Hejelah, who was killed in an Israeli air strike, mourn during his funeral in Gaza City. REUTERS/Mohammed Salem Reuters / Thursday, April 12, 2018 Palestinian relatives of Hamas gunman Mohammed Hejelah, who was killed in an Israeli air strike, mourn during his funeral in Gaza City. REUTERS/Mohammed Salem Close 22 / 24 
U.S. President Donald Trump's personal lawyer Michael Cohen exits a hotel in New York City. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid Reuters / Wednesday, April 11, 2018 U.S. President Donald Trump's personal lawyer Michael Cohen exits a hotel in New York City. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid Close 23 / 24 
A young gold miner works in Makala gold mine camp near the town of Mongbwalu in Ituri   A young gold miner works in Makala gold mine camp near the town of Mongbwalu in Ituri province, eastern Democratic Republic of Congo. REUTERS/Goran Tomasevic Close
